org.impact2585.lib2585

Class MPU6050

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.impact2585.lib2585.MPU6050
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable

    public class MPU6050
extends java.lang.Object
implements Destroyable
    Systems on the robot should use this class if they want to use an MPU6050 to measure acceleration and orientation

        public void writeBit(int register,
                     int position,
                     boolean bit)
        writes a bit to the slave register through I2C
        Parameters:
        register - the register to write the bit to
        position - the bit to write to (0-7)
        bit - turn the bit on or off
